com.milk.uberchat.spacebar
Class SBConnectionHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.uberchat.spacebar.SBConnectionHandler
class SBConnectionHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a front end on the actual socket connecting to SpaceBar.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1998 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
